songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Chopper like the creeper
These niggas is eaters
Told that bitch don’t call my phone
Just hit me on the beeper
I can’t trust a goofy
They be fighting over reefa
Your nigga a stain
But lil Izzy is a keeper
Your lil hoe a no show
Got rid, them my old hoes
Ain’t a rap bitch, fucking with me
Yeah I’m solo
Brother, yeah, ain’t beat the case
I get the cake like easy bake
Niggas bitches, they ain’t killing
I could see it on they face
Rest In Peace a snitch bitch
He belong to die
Homie set a nigga up
I couldn’t even look her in the eye
You ain’t riding with the gang
Check the score we multiply
You ain’t riding with gang
Then somebody getting fried

[Bridge]
Count it up, add it up
That bitch a leech
Pockets Matted up, fatted up
My shoes a g, on my daddy
Yeah I went and put some gold up on my teeth
And that hoe we throwing sets
Momma really was a G

[Verse 2]
I love my chopper
Fucking up the sheets
Wet you up with the chopper
Talking bout you bleeding
Have you singing like the opera
I don’t fuck with bloods
Send your slob ass to the doctor
Turning up the club
I be cooling with my cuh, aye
Disrespectful bitch
I silence and I keep a mug, aye
Texas attitude
Seen a bitch done fucked the plug aye
He know how I’m coming when I say I’m off the drug aye
He know how I’m coming when I say I need the drug aye

[Hook]
Don’t love these niggas but these niggas love me
Yeah, erase a nigga if he talking bout a Wii, uh
These niggas geeking, thinking they can fuck with me, yeah
Don’t love these niggas but these niggas love me, uh
Don’t love these niggas but these niggas love me, uh
Don’t love these niggas but these niggas love me, uh
I fucked the chopper, he in love, how I freak, uh
Don’t love these niggas but these niggas love me, uh
I fucked the chopper, he in love, how I freak
songs.title: I Luv My Choppa
